Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.network

Class SocketClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.network.SocketClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, Observable<java.lang.String>, java.lang.Runnable
public class SocketClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable<java.lang.String>, ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable
Each instance is a connection to a specific client

    • close

      private void close​(java.lang.String playerName, Room room)
      Close a connection. Finds the room and removes the player from it. If theres no more player in the room removes the room from the server. Then, close the socket.
      Parameters:
      playerName -
      room -

    • run

      public void run()
      When a socket runs, it stays in waiting for a Setupper. If the Setupper is not accepted send a Reject Message and keeps listening. If the Setupper is accepted sends an Accept Message and makes the Setupper Action, then it stays in waiting for the next message (Should be a move type or a disconnection Setupper). When a connection is set and recives a new Message it calls the notify. If a connection is not Active for some reason or throws an exception calls the close method.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      Parameters:

    • handleSetupper

      public void handleSetupper​(Settable setupper)
      If a setupper can set an action, makes the action. Otherwise sends a RejectMessage. Should be called just for a Disconnection Setupper.
      Parameters:
      setupper -
